reviewText: Mao Wei returns from the Yenwon Reformatory Division, to find his former love, Annie (Vivian Hsu), well on the way to marrying another man. He prevents the marriage and works his way back into her heart. Soon after, they marry. Still a virgin, Annie is looking to finally make love to her husband. Unfortunately, flashbacks to his brutal treatment in prison, prevents him from being able to fulfill their mutual wish. Feeling inadequate and depressed, he leaves Annie, wishing for her to find another man. She eventually does, but still longs for Mao Wei. After becoming pregnant by the other man, she finds Mao Wei and begs him to return and father the baby.

This is basically a remake of Andrei Konchalovsky's MARIA'S LOVERS, with Vivian Hsu in the Nastassja Kinski role.  It's not as artful and is a bit more graphic than the original, but with the adorable Ms. Hsu doing her (frequently naked) thing, it's tough to judge it too harshly.  Adjust your expectations accordingly.
